name: Knecht Ruprecht
skill: Deals 5576/6656 DMG to an enemy (healers priority).
ability: Skill attacks sharply decrease target's ATK speed.
Skill attacks have a significant chance of inflicting Silence.
bond: Increases Miss Santa's skill DMG by 5%

additional_data.description: A spirit that accompanies St. Nicholas on his travels. He asks children if they can pray, and gives naughty children who can't disappointing presents like coal or sticks, gathered from deep in the mountains just before Christmas. But, these days, there are fewer and fewer naughty children, so, more often than not, Knecht Ruprecht is the one who ends up being disappointed.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 24/12/16 - 06/01/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 125 Mochi 06/01/17 - 11/01/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/01/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Heh heh. And what do you want, my child?"
summon: "Where have all the naughty children gone?"
